m4fVbj1Im_kTZ3cRj.name: Diffuse
m4fVbj1Im_kTZ3cRj.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

m24XSLIqhIYh2axOD.name: Homogenous
m24XSLIqhIYh2axOD.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mmAqRDiute2mtAudn.name: No Blood
mmAqRDiute2mtAudn.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

m5Do_k1G6fX8Jl5wi.name: No Brain
m5Do_k1G6fX8Jl5wi.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mrP6jE1-9rzDUN3xO.name: No Eyes
mrP6jE1-9rzDUN3xO.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

m1aAb8rnHU6xjBe6S.name: No Head
m1aAb8rnHU6xjBe6S.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

msPSHwUZ_5rZZl5jt.name: No Neck
msPSHwUZ_5rZZl5jt.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mC_f210ol5Tv7w49S.name: No Vitals
mC_f210ol5Tv7w49S.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mUS9nErAdIvKP5WJz.name: Unliving
mUS9nErAdIvKP5WJz.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
